Question: This person has contributed to over 50 films over his career as actor, director, producer, and composer.
Hints: French President Jacques Chirac told this person that he embodied "the best of Hollywood".
In 2000, this person directed and starred in Space Cowboys alongside Tommy Lee Jones, Donald Sutherland, and James Garner.
Later that year, this person starred in Any Which Way You Can, the sequel to Every Which Way but Loose.
